mapper.select: SELECT a.FDCL_ID as foodId , a.FDCL_NM as foodName , a.FD_TP_ID as foodTypeId , (SELECT b.CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD b WHERE a.FD_TP_ID=b.CD_ID AND b.GRP_VAL='03') as foodTypeName , a.FD_UNIT_ID as unitTypeId , (SELECT b.FS_NM_ENG FROM TB_FS_UNIT b WHERE a.FD_UNIT_ID=b.FS_ID) as unitTypeName , a.UNT_CL_VAL as unitCalorieVal , a.USE_YN as useYn , a.REG_DT as regDt , a.UDP_DT as udpDt FROM TB_FS_FDCL a WHERE a.USE_YN = 'Y' AND a.FDCL_ID = ${value}

SELECT a.FDCL_ID as foodId , a.FDCL_NM as foodName , a.FD_TP_ID as foodTypeId , (SELECT b.CD_NM FROM TB_CMM_CD b WHERE a.FD_TP_ID=b.CD_ID AND b.GRP_VAL='03') as foodTypeName , a.FD_UNIT_ID as unitTypeId , (SELECT b.FS_NM_ENG FROM TB_FS_UNIT b WHERE a.FD_UNIT_ID=b.FS_ID) as unitTypeName , a.UNT_CL_VAL as unitCalorieVal , a.USE_YN as useYn , a.REG_DT as regDt , a.UDP_DT as udpDt FROM TB_FS_FDCL a WHERE a.USE_YN = 'Y'
